subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Otto Porter Jr.’s layup with 9.5 seconds remaining in the second overtime gave No. 7 Georgetown a victory over Connecticut. In other action, Penn State upset No. 4 Michigan.
snippet: Otto Porter Jr.’s layup with 9.5 seconds remaining in the second overtime gave No. 7 Georgetown a victory over Connecticut. In other action, Penn State upset No. 4 Michigan.
